description: |-
  Validate that a string is a well-formed JSON Web Token (JWT).
---

# function: jwt

Returns true when the input string is a well-formed JWT (three base64url segments).

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  tokens = [
    // header: {"alg":"HS256"} payload: {"sub":"1234"}
    "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0In0.SflKxwRJSMeKKF2QT4fwpMeJf36POk6yJV_adQssw5c",
  ]
}

output "jwt_example" {
  value = [
    for t in local.tokens : {
      value = t
      valid = provider::validatefx::jwt(t)
    }
  ]
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
jwt(value string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `value` (String, Nullable) String value to validate.
